strings.string: The ones who sent you do not believe in me
They are the real enemy. The enemy of progress.
...but you don't care about any of that, don't you?
How much did they pay you, anyway?
Was it worth the cost of your one true love?
She trusted you, and you let her die.
You could kill every last living thing in this lab...
...and you still could never be forgiven for that
You'll be cursed until you draw your last bleeding breath.
